entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a character who has been mentioned throughout the story. He is talking to Harry and then later to Dumbledore.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a character who is being discussed by Snape and Dumbledore. He is leaving his aunt and uncle's house.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a character who is giving instructions to Snape. He wants Snape to give Voldemort the correct date of Harry's departure.

relationships.description: Dumbledore gives instructions to Snape on how to handle Voldemort and ensure Harry's safety.
Snape is informed by Dumbledore that he needs to give Voldemort the correct date of Harry's departure.
